content: I think I'll also start tracking my daily cleaning routine in Habitica, in addition to the one-touch rule. I've been doing it for 3 weeks now, and I want to make sure I keep up the momentum. Do you think it's a good idea to set up a habit for each specific cleaning task, like "make bed" or "wipe down kitchen counters", or should I set up a general "daily cleaning" habit and track it as a whole?
